tags: None
review: **** ** *** **** ********* ******* ******** *** ***** Dr. Henna and Dr. Sughandha both are so patient with my kid. The staff is welcoming and nice, most importantly they help my kid relax and have a good experience at the dentist. The clinic is so kid friendly and that makes our visits be fun. I feel like they provided a lot useful information in every one of our visits. Dr. Henna never rushes us, but always explains what is going on with our kid and what‚Äôs her recommendations are. Highly recommend this practice, specially if you have little ones who are nervous about seeing the dentist.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Vipin sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to extend my thanks to the entire team of junior smiles for giving my daughter the best teatment i could hve wished for. She is 5 and a half n was really traumatised whenever i talked her about dentist. But coming to amil solved my problem. Sge had severe problem with her teeth some needed fillings n two of them RCT. I was taken a back wheni was told she needed RCT. But the way they councelled her made her comfortable and she was jubilant. After going back when i heard her saying when r we seeing dr sugandha again. I think that sums up all to define her a perfect guide friend and a satusfying devoter performing everything effectively and efficiently. Thank u for being there for her. U can trust u anytime.
reply_text: Thank you for your motivating words ma'am. They reinforce our belief that little smiles do matter!

tags: None
review: Doctor was extremely helpful... Words really can't describe our first dental appointment. She was really friendly with our kud made him comfortable as it was his first experience. Explained everything in detail and was in no rush to see other patients. Surely will recommend to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter only 6 years old wish to visit Dr Sugandha everyday..whatelse as a parent can expect..the whole team of Aimil dental clinic made her so comfortable that such a major tooth extraction  for such a small baby was a no big deal..thanks once again to the whole team...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Sugandha's AIMIL clinic to get my daughter's tooth cavity treated in August 2023. We attended four of the five visits planned by her and didn't like her attitude *** **** ****** as she neither conveyed the cost of the treatment before the treatment nor the justification of it after the treatment. I want to stress that,  she only explains the details of the treatment but not the cost- I am stressing this point because I saw many reviews where it was written that she explains very well. Being a healthcare provider I understand the importance of conveying cost of the treatment to the patient. Inspite of the unpleasant experience, I didn't write any adverse review but recently when I visited  a dentist (as the filling Dr. Sugandha did came out after 2 months), ** **** ** **** **** *** ******* ******* ******* *** *** *** ** ***** ** *** **** ** ******** ********** *** **** ********* *** **** *** ** *** ******* ** *** * ** ****** ***** *** ***** ******* **** ******* *** ***** **** ****** ** *** ****** ** ******** **** * ******* ** ********, *** * ** ******* ** * ** ******* ******* ****** *** ** ****** ******* *** ******* ** ******* ****** ** *** **** ****** *** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Awesome Client experience 
Would highly and positively recommend anyone looking for consultation in pediatric dentistry.
Amazing Place to get treatment 
Well qualified Panel of Doctors 
Ambience State of Art place to be
Patient Handling is Beyond A+ Experience. When i went with my 5 year Old son for the first time I was more panicky assuming myself being on the same chair. But my notions went off in no time when I saw Dr. Sugandha talking to my son as if they were long age friends that helped making him so comfortable to get the best of cooperation on dental chair. 
Great Work !! Keep it Up Team Junior Smiles. üíê
Wish you keep smiles of Juniors intact and shining for years to come !! üòä
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and encouragement!We aim to make your child's dental experience a positive one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Took both my children for dental treatment- one less than 2 years of age. Was very apprehensive at first and had visited two other dentists before going to AIMIL. But all my worries were put to rest by the very experienced team. They handled both my children in the most patient and gentle manner possible. Very happy with their professional and thorough approach. The kids and we loved the clinic ambience too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sugandha is a highly experienced child's specialist that one can blindly rely upon.  She will always suggest what's best for you.  Being a child specialist, her cheerful attitude and the way of explaining the procedure makes the treatment go much more smoother.  I would highly recommend Dr. Sugandha to the parents whose kids are having any kind of dental problems.  I am fully satisfied with the treatment.

Keep up the good work.
